      • fileToScanner

        public static java.util.Scanner fileToScanner(java.lang.String fName,
                                              int fileNum)
        Converts the given file to Scanner
        Parameters:
        fName - The String name of a file
        fileNum - The file number, used in case of exceptions or errors to tell user which file failed
        Returns:
        A Scanner of the file with the given file name

      • outputFile

        public static java.io.PrintWriter outputFile(java.lang.String fName)
        Creates a file of the given name
        Parameters:
        fName - The name of the file to be created
        Returns:
        A PrintWriter of the same name as fName which can be manipulated and then saved

      • checkBraces

        public static boolean checkBraces(java.util.Scanner toBeChecked)
        Checks if the braces in a given file are balanced
        Parameters:
        toBeChecked - The name of the file to be checked
        Returns:

      • compareScanners

        public static boolean compareScanners(java.util.Scanner f1,
                                      java.util.Scanner f2)
        Compares two Scanner files to see if they are equal
        Parameters:
        f1 - The first file to be checked
        f2 - The second file to be checked
        Returns:
        A boolean of whether or not the files are balanced

      • getUserWords

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getUserWords(java.util.Scanner file)
        Gets an ArrayList of Strings from the user to replace specific placeholders in a given Scanner file
        Parameters:
        file - A Scanner with placeholders (noted with < and >) to be replaced
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Strings made up of the user's responses

      • writeWords

        public static void writeWords(java.util.Scanner story,
                              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> words,
                              java.io.PrintWriter output)
        Rewrites a given Scanner file using an ArrayList of Strings to replace certain placeholders, and prints the result into the given output file
        Parameters:
        story - The Scanner file to be rewritten, removing placeholders
        words - An ArrayList of Strings to take the place of given placeholders in the Scanner file
        output - The output file for the rewritten file to be printed to

      • checkWords

        public static boolean checkWords(java.util.Scanner story,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> words)
        Checks if the number of placeholders is the same as the number of Strings in an ArrayList (Used to check if user input is necessary)
        Parameters:
        story - The Scanner file to be checked for number of placeholders
        words - The ArrayList of Strings which will replace the placeholders, checking if its size is enough to replace all the placeholders
        Returns:
        Whether there are additional lines that have yet to be replaced and contain placeholders

      • getArgsWords

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getArgsWords(java.util.Scanner file)
        Creates an ArrayList of Strings made up of all the lines from a given file
        Parameters:
        file - The Scanner file to be converted to an ArrayList
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Strings made up of all the lines from a given file
